pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Hackerman](https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/2090713a50fcdae69b802e73815000a4?s=328&d=identicon&r=PG ) # What is Flux?Flux is a Python library enabling you to create virtual timelines and use them to test long processes.For more details, see the documentation at http://flux.readthedocs.org
